TopicTitle: The High Road - Manned Mission to Dres

Articles.Content:
So, I decided to take a manned mission to Dres - the furthest Ive ever taken a manned mission in my KSP career.

I built a new ship capable of taking 15 kerbals to Dres. I also built a refinery, miner, tug and lander - all combined in 3 flights to Dres.

Then I thought - I need to keep a record of this, could be interesting - so I decided to chronicle the whole thing over on my blog - you can find part one here : Kryten's Kerblog : The High Road Part 1

The aim of the mission - to see if I can do it, and maybe to snag a dresteroid into the bargain.

Heres a shot of the Explorer 2, just to whet your appetites, hope you enjoy:
